content:
Christian Jodra is a Golang Software Engineer at CounterCraft, based in Basque Country. He specializes in Go, Data Engineering and Agentic AI.
His current focus is building tools that enable AI interact with the real life.
In his spare time, he build side projects, do sports and ride his motorbike on endless roads.
Social Media # He currently was on LinkeIn, but feel free to follow him on GitHub as well.

title: About

content: Hello! I am a Golang Sofware Engineer at CounterCraft, where I focus on Go, and AI agents. On this blog I will share the side projects I am working on, from Data projects to hardware experiments.
